name: vCard Converter for Outlook

screenshots.caption: Convert Multiple vCard into Outlook or save Outlook Contacts in vCard

short_description: For making the contacts portable on every device, a Two-Way Conversion program like vCard Converter Software must be used. It’s a Dual-Purpose utility that assures complete information security and speed during Bulk-operations. Multiple contacts can be exported and imported bi-directionally. So, without any doubt, convert Outlook contacts to vCard (VCF files) and side-by-side also convert vCard to Outlook Address book in batch using one App only.
summary: Convert vCard to Outlook Contacts Moreover Outlook to vCard in Bulk
